name: H16DA
author: RABBITKNG
description:
A
 minimalized color palette inspired by the graphic novel, Hilda by Luke 
Pearson. I wanted something a little restrictive that forces you to get 
creative with how you apply your colors without making the challenge 
unenjoyable. I started off with screen grabs of the pages and animated 
series then tweaked as needed so its more of my interpretation than a 
perfect match. I'm using it to colorize a Game Boy Color project I'm 
working on and i like the results. see the sample image
